about.title: About Cognithon 26
about.description:
Cognithon’26 is an all-women hackathon created to inspire innovation, collaboration, and bold problem-solving. It brings together passionate female coders, designers, and thinkers to develop meaningful tech solutions in a supportive, empowering space. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, Cognithon’26 gives you the platform to learn, build, and showcase your creativity.

More than a competition, Cognithon’26 celebrates the strength and vision of women in technology. Participants get the chance to explore new ideas, work with mentors, and turn concepts into impactful prototypes. This is where confidence grows, skills sharpen, and women lead the future of innovation.

rules: All code must be written during the hackathon.
Decisions of the judges are final.
